resources.string:
Game: Poker Dice

Version: 1007

Date: 07/12/2023

Author: Pete Storli

Role: Senior Android Software Engineer

Email: pstorli@gmail.com

URL: http://storlidesigns.com
You seem a little low on cash.\n\nDo you need a loan?
Not enough cash to place that bet!

RoyalFlush (60): Five die of same suit and highest in seq values. 

Straight Flush (50): Five die same suit in seq order. 

Five of a kind (45): Five die with the same value. 

Four of a kind (40): Four die with the same value. 

Full House (35): Three of a kind die with a pair of die. 

Flush (30): Five die of the same suit. 

Straight (25): Five die of any suit in sequential order. 

Three of a Kind (20): Three die with the same numeric value. 

Two Pair (15): Two different pair of dice in the same hand. 

One Pair (10): One pair of dice in a hand. 

Highest Die: The highest die in the hand.
Click squares on edge of board to place your bets. Then click Start.
To hold a dice, click on it. Border will turn pink.\nKeep clicking roll dice until you either cash out or have no more rolls.
Click here for free prize for completing %1$s levels!
